text:
Hi everyone,

Does anyone know of a way to *edit the styling of an embedded form* via an API call?

The embed code has this format:
```<script src="<https://js.hsforms.net/forms/embed/123456.js>" defer></script>
<div class="hs-form-frame" data-region="na1" data-form-id="abc-123-edf-456" data-portal-id="123456"></div>```
I'd like to use something like:
```hbspt.forms.create({
  region: "na1",
  portalId: "123456",
  formId: "abc-123-edf-456",
  target: ".selected-class",
  css: ".selected-class div {background:blue;}",
});```
... but the form doesn't get generated. The endpoint is <https://js.hsforms.net/forms/v2.js>
I'm using the *New Form Editor (Beta)* because I need a multi-step form
